translations: lemma refl [simp]: "dist x x = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x x = 0
by simp
end

locale metric =
  fixes dist :: "'p \<Rightarrow> 'p \<Rightarrow> real"
  assumes [simp]: "dist x y = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> x = y"
  and triangle: "dist x z \<le> dist y x + dist y z"
sublocale metric < semimetric

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. semimetric dist
proof

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. 0 \<le> dist x y
 2. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 3. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. 0 \<le> dist x y
 2. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 3. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x
fix w

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. 0 \<le> dist x y
 2. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 3. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x
have "dist w w = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist w w = 0
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  dist w w = 0

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. 0 \<le> dist x y
 2. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 3. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x

proof (state)
this:
  dist ?w2 ?w2 = 0

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. 0 \<le> dist x y
 2. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 3. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x
note [simp] = this

proof (state)
this:
  dist ?w2 ?w2 = 0

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. 0 \<le> dist x y
 2. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 3. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x
fix x y

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. 0 \<le> dist x y
 2. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 3. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x
show "0 \<le> dist x y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> dist x y
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> dist x y
from triangle [of y y x]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  dist y y \<le> dist x y + dist x y
show "0 \<le> dist x y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  dist y y \<le> dist x y + dist x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> dist x y
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  0 \<le> dist x y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  0 \<le> dist x y

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 2. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x
show "dist x y = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> x = y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  (dist x y = 0) = (x = y)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y. dist x y = dist y x
show "dist x y = dist y x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x
fix w z

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x
have "dist w z \<le> dist z w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist w z \<le> dist z w
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist w z \<le> dist z w
from triangle [of w z z]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  dist w z \<le> dist z w + dist z z
show "dist w z \<le> dist z w"

proof (prove)
using this:
  dist w z \<le> dist z w + dist z z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist w z \<le> dist z w
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  dist w z \<le> dist z w

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  dist w z \<le> dist z w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x

proof (state)
this:
  dist ?w2 ?z2 \<le> dist ?z2 ?w2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x
hence "dist x y \<le> dist y x" and "dist y x \<le> dist x y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  dist ?w2 ?z2 \<le> dist ?z2 ?w2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y \<le> dist y x &&& dist y x \<le> dist x y
by simp+

proof (state)
this:
  dist x y \<le> dist y x
  dist y x \<le> dist x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x
thus "dist x y = dist y x"

proof (prove)
using this:
  dist x y \<le> dist y x
  dist y x \<le> dist x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dist x y = dist y x
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  dist x y = dist y x

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  dist x y = dist y x

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

definition norm_dist :: "('a::real_normed_vector) \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> real" where
[simp]: "norm_dist x y \<equiv> norm (x - y)"
interpretation norm_metric: metric norm_dist

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. metric norm_dist
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (norm_dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 2. \<And>x z y. norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z
fix x y

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (norm_dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
 2. \<And>x z y. norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z
show "norm_dist x y = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> x = y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (norm_dist x y = 0) = (x = y)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  (norm_dist x y = 0) = (x = y)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x z y. norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z
fix z

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x z y. norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z
from norm_triangle_ineq [of "x - y" "y - z"]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  norm (x - y + (y - z)) \<le> norm (x - y) + norm (y - z)

have
    "norm (x - z) \<le> norm (x - y) + norm (y - z)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  norm (x - y + (y - z)) \<le> norm (x - y) + norm (y - z)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. norm (x - z) \<le> norm (x - y) + norm (y - z)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  norm (x - z) \<le> norm (x - y) + norm (y - z)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x z y. norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z
with norm_minus_commute [of x y]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  norm (x - y) = norm (y - x)
  norm (x - z) \<le> norm (x - y) + norm (y - z)

show
    "norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z"

proof (prove)
using this:
  norm (x - y) = norm (y - x)
  norm (x - z) \<le> norm (x - y) + norm (y - z)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  norm_dist x z \<le> norm_dist y x + norm_dist y z

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
